data.text: É niima minazeɠegi woni Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ,
«Gè la lɛa nà-pɛlɛi wu, nii gè bu,
gè la vaa bu, ɲiimɛnii ʋa lɔ gàazu,
eyɛsu gè ada zɔlɔɔ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ ga seizu,
Wɛlɛ, gi yɛni Efelata, gi minazeɠe kesui maawoo mɛni,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, ʋa ɗa-looɠo bosuʋɛ,
Telebodai ɠa ɠɛ ɗa-zalaɠa ɠula nuiti kɔba,
Ɗa-nɛɛbɛi maaʋele ma, é lo ɗa-wotiɠɛ nui Davide ʋa,
Ni è-loun zunuiti ta ziɛna ga nà-minazeɠegi,
Ungo, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI yeeloni Siyɔn ʋa,
Ungo, nà tuya loo bɛ, gè ani ʋagɔiti pɛ fe zea.
Nà kizo fai loo ná-zalaɠa ɠula nuiti kɔba,
Nà sili nuiti maaɠili ga unfegi,
